name: Запрос
ui:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang='ru'>
<head><meta charset='UTF-8'></head>
<body>
<skif-document id='signature' name='Запрос'>
    <skif-group id='signature' name='Подпись'>
        <skif-text-line id='post' name='Должность' required='true'></skif-text-line>
        <skif-text-line id='name' name='ФИО' required='true'></skif-text-line>
    </skif-group>
    <skif-date-time id='time' name='Время' type='time'></skif-date-time>
</skif-document>
</body>
</html>
